puzzle
Class PuzzleCell

java.lang.Object
  puzzle.PuzzleCell

public class PuzzleCell
extends java.lang.Object

A PuzzleCell is used as a specialized container for a character used in the generated puzzle

Version:
3.0
Author:
Sad Panda Software

remove

public void remove()
If a puzzle cell contains more then one word, this decrements the number of words associated with this cell. If there is only one word, it decrements the number of words then removes the character from the puzzle cell.

remove

public void remove(Puzzle.Direction dir)
If a puzzle cell contains more then one word, this decrements the number of words associated with this cell. If there is only one word, it decrements the number of words then removes the character from the puzzle cell. It will also remove the associated direction

Parameters:
dir - direction to remove

public void setCharacter(char character)
Sets the char the puzzle cell contains.

Parameters:
character - - Sets the char the puzzle cell contains.
